articles.title: 6-year-old girl breaks Singapore's pi memorisation record; recites 1560 digits - AsiaOne
articles.description: SINGAPORE - Six-year-old Ishani Shanmugam broke the national record for most digits of pi memorised by reciting 1,560 decimal places of the mathematical constant. She beat memory trainers Sancy Suraj — who held the previous record with 1,505 digits in 2018 — …
articles.content:
SINGAPORE - Six-year-old Ishani Shanmugam broke the national record for most digits of pi memorised by reciting 1,560 decimal places of the mathematical constant.
